belongs_to_collection.name: My Daddy's Point Of View Collection

response.overview: Ellie Murphy has been dumped and her stepdad has a plan to brighten her mood. The premise is simple: a small step- dad/stepdaughter date. Everything is working well until the girl starts seeing her stepfather in a different... sexier light.  Penelope Woods develops feelings for her stepdad and resents her mom for neglecting him. She becomes aggressively sexual around him. He tries to resist her advances, but his lack of sex and her hot body make it, and him, hard.  Maria Kazi is always causing trouble for her stepdad and today's the day she makes up for it. She gives up her mouth first, swallowing his huge cock, and later lets her stepdad pound her pussy to his heart's content.  Sage Rabbit is shy and unsure of herself. Her stepdad knows she is a sweet and sexy girl, so he attempts to try and get her to be more feminine, hoping to help her out with her self-esteem by empowering her with her sexuality.
response.title: My Daddy's Point Of View 15
